basics.name: Javier Arranz
basics.label: Full-stack | Data | Cloud
basics.summary: Product engineer with end-to-end ownership across the full stack, including: infrastructure, backend, frontend, security, and delivery pipelines. Combines deep expertise in modern serverless architectures with a track record of shipping high-impact features from concept to production.

work.name: Flock
work.summary: Own complete product features from infrastructure design through delivery and monitoring. Build serverless, event-driven systems collaborating with Trading and Growth teams across the entire stack; infrastructure provisioning, database design, backend services, frontend interfaces, security implementation, and user feedback integration.
highlights: Design and implement serverless event-driven architectures on AWS using Lambda, EventBridge, and Queues
Build full-stack features end-to-end: IaC (Terraform and CDK), PostgreSQL, Node.js APIs, React
Implement security best practices, monitoring, and delivery pipelines with CI/CD and TDD approaches

work.name: Infinity Works (Part of Accenture)
work.summary: Delivered full-stack solutions for insurance platform, owning features from architecture design through production deployment across backend services, frontend interfaces, and cloud infrastructure.
highlights: Built microservices and serverless functions using Node.js and TypeScript with PostgreSQL databases
Designed and implemented complete features end-to-end including AWS infrastructure, APIs, and React frontends
Collaborated across teams to deliver secure, scalable solutions from concept to production

work.name: MTS Health Limited
work.summary: Owned complete data solutions from ingestion to visualization, building ETL pipelines and analytics tools that consolidated multiple data sources to enable data-driven business decisions.
highlights: Designed and implemented end-to-end data pipelines using Python and SQL Server for medical device data
Built ETL processes to consolidate data from disparate sources into unified analytics schemas
Developed complex T-SQL queries and stored procedures to power business intelligence dashboards

certificates.name: Amazon Web Services Solutions Architect - Associate

projects.name: Vagus nerve activity recording and processing based on CNT yarn electrodes
projects.description: Intrafascicular vagal activity recording and analysis based on carbon nanotube yarn electrode.

volunteer.summary: We worked in the development of a wearable device capable of helping Traumatic Brain Injury patients manage its energy and stress levels.
